tools.description: Retrieves gallery-related information about a product, including product, lifestyle, annotated and other images with different resolutions and indication of the main image. Use this tool when the user asks about product images, gallery, visuals, or photos related to a product.

BrandName.description: Brand name of the product (e.g., 'HP', 'Dell', 'Apple'). Required when using Brand+ProductCode identification method.

GTIN.description: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN/EAN/UPC) for direct product lookup (e.g., '0195949038747'). When provided and valid, takes priority over Brand+ProductCode. Supported formats: EAN-13, UPC-12, GTIN-14.

ProductCode.description: Product code/part number/MPN (e.g., 'ABC123', 'XYZ-456'). Required when using Brand+ProductCode identification method.

tools.name: product_gallery

images.description: List of product images from the gallery sorted by order. Each image contains order, type, main indicator, and URLs for different resolutions. If empty, gallery information is not available for this product.
Object that groups the URLs of the same image in different resolutions. Example: { "high": "url", "medium": "url", "low": "url", "thumb": "url" }.

is_main.description: Indicates whether this is the main (default) image for the product. Example: true.

order.description: The display sequence number of the image within the product gallery. Example: 1 (the first image to display).

type.description: The category of the image, indicating its purpose (e.g., Product Image, Lifestyle Image, Product Image Annotated).

tools.description: Retrieves fundamental information about a product, including its brand, name, product code, GTINs, and category. Use this tool when the user asks for basic product identifiers.

BrandName.description: Brand name of the product (e.g., 'HP', 'Dell', 'Apple'). Required when using Brand+ProductCode identification method.

GTIN.description: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN/EAN/UPC) for direct product lookup (e.g., '0195949038747'). When provided and valid, takes priority over Brand+ProductCode. Supported formats: EAN-13, UPC-12, GTIN-14.

ProductCode.description: Product code/part number/MPN (e.g., 'ABC123', 'XYZ-456'). Required when using Brand+ProductCode identification method.

tools.name: product_identifiers

brand.description: The official brand name of the product. Example: HP, Samsung, Disney

category.description: The final product category in the Icecat category hierarchy. Always represents the most specific category level. Example: Laptops, Smartphones

family.description: The official product family that groups related products under the same brand. Indicates that similar products exist in this line. Example: Frozen (Disney), Batman (LEGO), EliteBook (HP)

gtins.description: Global Trade Item Numbers (GTINs), which are internationally recognized product identifiers. Supported lengths are 12, 13, or 14 digits. Example: 0885909950805

product_code.description: The official product identifier assigned by the manufacturer. This may be referred to as MPN (Manufacturer Part Number), SKU, or Part Number. Example: 20YHCTO1WW

product_name.description: The official full product name as provided by the brand. Typically descriptive and user-facing. Example: ThinkPad E14 Gen 7 (AMD)

series.description: The official product series, representing a subgroup within a family. A series is defined only when a family is present. Example: 1000 Series (HP EliteBook Family)

tools.description: Retrieves product manual information, including links to PDF documents and their related locales. Use this tool when the user asks about product manuals, instruction guides, or usage instructions.

tools.name: product_manual

manuals.description: List of available product manuals. Each manual includes a direct URL and optional locale information. If no manuals are available, this will be an empty array.

locale.description: The language/locale code of the manual (e.g., 'EN', 'DE', 'FR'). Indicates which language the manual is written in.

manual_url.description: The direct URL link to the product manual file (PDF or equivalent). Example: https://objects.icecat.biz/objects/mmo_12345678.pdf

category.description: The final product category in the Icecat category hierarchy. Always represents the most specific category level. Example: Laptops, Smartphones

safety_docs.description: List of safety and regulatory compliance documents (carbon footprint, energy labels, CE markings, declarations of conformity, etc.). If empty, safety documentation is not available for this product.

document_type.description: The type of the document (e.g., 'Carbon Footprint', 'Repairability Index', 'Durability Index', 'EU Energy Label', 'UK Energy Label', 'EU Product Fiche', 'EU Declaration of Conformity', 'UK Declaration of Conformity', 'CE Marking', 'Safety Data Sheet').

document_url.description: The direct URL link to the document (PDF or equivalent). Example: https://objects.icecat.biz/objects/mmo_98765432.pdf

source_locale.description: The locale of the document actually provided by the MCP. Example: FR (French - France). Different documents may have different locales.

specs.description: Structured product specifications and features organized into groups. Each group contains a list of specifications with names, values, and optional descriptions

group.description: A logical grouping of related product specifications and features. Used to organize individual specifications and features into structured sections. Example: Display, Processor, Memory, Connectivity.

feature_description.description: The definition or explanation of the feature or specification itself, independent of any product-specific value. Clarifies the meaning and scope of the aspect. Example: Processor Speed — the maximum clock frequency at which the processor operates.

name.description: The name of a specific product specification or feature within a group. Defines what aspect of the product is described. Example: Processor Speed, Screen Size, Battery Capacity.

value.description: The value that corresponds to the specification or feature for the product. Provides the actual detail for that aspect. Example: 2.3 GHz, 14", 56 Wh (for Battery Capacity).

texts.description: Retrieves brand-supplied product texts, including marketing text, official product naming, summaries, disclaimers, and bullet point highlights.

brief_description.description: A short descriptive text of the product, typically one or two sentences, summarizing its main characteristics

bullet_points.description: A list of product highlights or key features in bullet point format. Each bullet describes a single feature or benefit

disclaimer.description: Legal or informational disclaimer text provided by the brand. Usually clarifies limitations, responsibilities, or usage conditions

full_product_name.description: The complete official product naming string provided by the brand. It includes detailed specifications and other key attributes. Example: 6th gen Intel® Core™ i5-6200U (3M Cache, 2.3 GHz), 8GB DDR4-SDRAM, 256GB SSD, 35.6 cm (14") Full HD 1920 x 1080 Touch, Intel® HD Graphics 520, WLAN, WebCam, Windows 10 Pro 64-bit

long_summary.description: A detailed product summary with extended descriptions of features or specifications

marketing_text.description: Promotional or commercial text provided by the brand. Focused on highlighting product features, benefits, or selling points

short_summary.description: A concise product summary highlighting the most important features. Optimized for quick understanding

warranty.description: The warranty period or terms provided for the product. If warranty information is not available, this field will contain: 'Warranty information is not available.'
